 2010-07602010-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY, 
ActRadiocommunication Act
SubjectRadiocommunication Act (subsection 4(1) and paragraph 9(1)(b)) Exemption Order (Security, Safety and International Relations), No. 2010-5
PrecisRADIOCOMMUNICATION ACT (SUBSECTION 4(1) AND PARAGRAPH 9(1)(B)) EXEMPTION ORDER (SECURITY, SAFETY AND INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS), NO. 2010-5 - which exempts the RCMP from the application of this Act with respect to interfering with radiocommunication signals during the visit of the President of the People's Republic of China from June 23 to June 25, 2010.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0135 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
